params.amount: The amount the customer is paying
params.merchant: The merchant's address which the funds get sent to
params.proof: The address that the receipt or the refund will be sent to

processPayment(address,address,uint256,a.details: Calulates the payament address given the following parameters

getPaymentAddress(address,address,uint25.notice: Calulates the payament address given the following parameters

markSuccussfulTransfer().notice: Used by the sweeper contracts to notify the payments contract that it has succesfully sweeped the funds. The payments will then issue a NFT reciept to the buyer.

documentation.text: @title Sweeps ERC20's from the payment address to the merchants address
@title Sweeps ether from the payment address to the merchants address
